Paul: My name is Paul from Iowa, and I am 65 years old. I was a secondary school teacher before I was diagnosed with brain cancer.

James: My name is James, I am 65 years old and have been living in Chicago my whole life. I was a construction worker, and now suffer from mouth cancer.
Susan: My name is Susan, I'm 66 years old. I'm from Kansas. I worked as a high school teacher for almost 25 years. Now, I am suffering from breast cancer.

Steve: My name is Steve, from Milwaukee. I am 70 years old now. I used to be a chef before I retired.
